name: Red V Blu
description:
A minimal game made with Unity where two players control ragdolls.

The ragdolls have guns. When fired, bullet-time kicks in and the bullet can ricochet once. 

The first player to shoot the other wins the round.
The objective is to win a best of 5 rounds.

Controls

Movement: Red - WASD | Blu - Arrow keys
Shoot: Red - C | Blu - L
Pause: Escape (ESC)

Attributions

  • Tilesheet: Kenny.nl - http://kenney.nl/assets/platformer-pack-industrial
  • Font: Teko - https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Teko
  • Music: Prefekt - Rose Tinted https://soundcloud.com/viktorsoderholm/prefekt-rose-tinted
  • Sound effects
    • Bullet hitting player: https://freesound.org/people/nebulasnails/sounds/405535/
    • Bullet hitting wall: https://freesound.org/people/timgormly/sounds/170957/
    • Bullet firing: https://freesound.org/people/Brokenphono/sounds/344142/
